    • Method Detail

      • timeout

        public Operation.Update timeout(@Nullable
                                Long timeout)
        Description copied from class: Operation
        Sets the optional timeout for this operation in milliseconds. Passing null or a non-positive value will remove any timeout previously set.
        Overrides:
        timeout in class Operation
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout; null or non-positive to reset
        Returns:
        this operation object for call chaining

      • namespaces

        public Operation.Update namespaces(@Nullable
                                   Map<String,String> namespaces)
        Description copied from class: Operation
        Sets the optional namespaces for this operation. Supplied namespaces overrides the namespaces inherited from the Session. Passing null will remove any namespace map previously set on the operation.
        Overrides:
        namespaces in class Operation
        Parameters:
        namespaces - the namespace map overriding session namespaces; null to reset
        Returns:
        this operation object for call chaining
